|chip1 = Atheros;AR9390;AR9390-AL1B; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 450/450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/07/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00MHYQMHC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 3x3:3 (450Mbps)
This device is designed for industrial temperature ranges.
Aircell FCC ID of Y7A-WPEA127NI (IC: 10226A-WPEA127NI)
OUI is per FCC label
===Specificatoins=== 802.11a/b/g/n Industrial-Grade Mini Card, [[Atheros]] AR9390-AL1B, 3T3R * Reference Design: XB114 * Standard: 802.11a/b/g/n * Host interface: Mini PCI-E * Chipset: Atheros AR9390-AL1B * Antenna: 3x U.FL connectors, 3T3R MIMO * Wireless connection data rate up to 450Mbps * Enhanced wireless security: 64/128-bits WEP, WPA, WPA2 * Support Windows XP/ Vista, Win 7, Linux, Android by request
[[Category:English Documentation]]
